summary: About half of U.S. hospitals are in urban areas. More urban hospitals closed than opened from 2019 to 2023. All of the 5 hospitals in our review struggled financially before they closed, with inpatient volumes decreasing at 4 of them. title: Urban Hospitals: Factors Contributing to Selected Hospital Closures and Related Changes in Available Health Care Services
